intro: Four disciplines, one goal: higher, further, accuracy!
description:
Jumping & Shooting – Mini Sports Fun!

Throw yourself into sporting fun: In exciting competitions in the long jump, high jump, pole vault and archery, you'll need timing and precision. Whether alone or in a group of four, this game guarantees fast-paced duels and great fun in short sessions.

• Choose your favourite character and put together your team.
• Compete in four exciting sports disciplines: long jump, high jump, pole vault and archery.
• Play solo or locally with up to 4 people.
